Protocols/StackedFormViewDelegate.html#/.name: stackedFormView(_:willElementExpandAt:)
Protocols/StackedFormViewDelegate.html#/.abstract: Tells the delegate the element at the given index is about to expand.

Protocols/StackedFormViewDelegate.html#/.name: stackedFormView(_:willElementCollapseAt:)
Protocols/StackedFormViewDelegate.html#/.abstract: Tells the delegate the element at the given index is about to collapse.

Protocols/StackedFormViewDelegate.html#/.name: stackedFormView(_:didElementExpandAt:)
Protocols/StackedFormViewDelegate.html#/.abstract: Tells the delegate the element at the given indexhas expanded.

Protocols/StackedFormViewDelegate.html#/.name: stackedFormView(_:didElementCollapseAt:)
Protocols/StackedFormViewDelegate.html#/.abstract: Tells the delegate the element at the given indexhas collapsed.

Protocols/StackedFormViewDelegate.html#/.name: stackedFormView(_:styleButtonForInvalidStateWith:)
Protocols/StackedFormViewDelegate.html#/.abstract: Asks the delegate to style call to action button for the invalid state

Protocols/StackedFormViewDelegate.html#/.name: stackedFormView(_:styleButtonForValidStateWith:)
Protocols/StackedFormViewDelegate.html#/.abstract: Asks the delegate to style call to action button for the valid state.

Protocols/StackedFormViewDelegate.html#/.name: stackedFormView(_:didCompleteFormWith:)
Protocols/StackedFormViewDelegate.html#/.abstract: Tells the delegate that the user completed filling the form.

Protocols/StackedFormViewDelegate.html#/.name: stackedFormView(_:collapsedHeightForElementAt:)
Protocols/StackedFormViewDelegate.html#/.abstract: Asks the delegate for the height of the collapsed stacked form view element at a given index.

Protocols/StackedFormViewDelegate.html#/.name: heightForCtaButton(in:)
Protocols/StackedFormViewDelegate.html#/.abstract: Tells the delegate to style call to action button for the valid state.

Protocols/StackedFormViewDataSource.html.name: numberOfElements(in:)
Protocols/StackedFormViewDataSource.html.abstract: Asks the data source for the number of elements in the stacked form view.

Protocols/StackedFormViewDataSource.html.name: stackedFormView(_:stackedFormElementAt:)
Protocols/StackedFormViewDataSource.html.abstract: Asks the data source for a stacked form element to insert in a particular location of the stacked form view.

Protocols/StackedFormElementDelegate.htm.name: dataDidBecomeInvalid(in:)
Protocols/StackedFormElementDelegate.htm.abstract: Informs the delegate that the data in this form element has become invalid.

Protocols/StackedFormElementDelegate.htm.name: dataDidBecomeValid(in:)
Protocols/StackedFormElementDelegate.htm.abstract: Informs the delegate that the data in this form element has become valid.

Protocols/StackedFormElementDelegate.htm.name: didFinishInput(in:)
Protocols/StackedFormElementDelegate.htm.abstract: Informs the delegate that the user is done filling the current form.

Protocols/StackedFormElement.html#/colla.name: collapsedView
Protocols/StackedFormElement.html#/colla.abstract: View that represents the collapsed state of the element.

Protocols/StackedFormElement.html#/expan.name: expandedView
Protocols/StackedFormElement.html#/expan.abstract: View that represents the expanded state of the element.

Protocols/StackedFormElement.html#/colla.name: collapsedViewHeight
Protocols/StackedFormElement.html#/colla.abstract: Height of the collapsed state of the element, excluding the overlap space.

Protocols/StackedFormElement.html#/ctaBu.name: ctaButtonText
Protocols/StackedFormElement.html#/ctaBu.abstract: The text of the of call to action button that corresponds to this stacked form element. A nil value will cause the call to action button disappear with animation. Conversly, if the call to action button does not exist for the previous element, the call to action button will appear with animation when set.

Protocols/StackedFormElement.html#/valid.name: valid
Protocols/StackedFormElement.html#/valid.abstract: A boolean that indicates whether the data of the current form is in a valid state. If the value of the property changes, inform the delegate of the change so it could disable/enable the call to action button accordingly.

Protocols/StackedFormElement.html#/deleg.name: delegate
Protocols/StackedFormElement.html#/deleg.abstract: The object that acts as the delegate of the stacked form view. It is not necesssary to set this property. Stacked form view will automatically act as the delegate and perform relevant actions when not set.

Protocols/StackedFormElement.html#/prepa.name: prepareToCollapse()
Protocols/StackedFormElement.html#/prepa.abstract: Stacked form view will call this method before the expanded stacked form element collapses. This is the best place to copy the data from the expanded view to the collapsed view.

Protocols/StackedFormElement.html#/prepa.name: prepareToExpand()
Protocols/StackedFormElement.html#/prepa.abstract: Stacked form view will call this method before the expanded stacked form element expands.

Protocols/StackedFormElement.html#/overl.name: overlapSpace
Protocols/StackedFormElement.html#/overl.abstract: Spacing from the bottom of stacked form element that is unsafe for your sub-views of collapsed view to be placed.

Protocols/StackedFormElement.html.name: StackedFormElement
Protocols/StackedFormElement.html.abstract: Protocol that represents each collapsed/expanded state of the stacked form view. Create an element by implementing this protocol for supplying it to the stack form view.

Protocols/StackedFormElementDelegate.htm.name: StackedFormElementDelegate
Protocols/StackedFormElementDelegate.htm.abstract: Methods for informing the data validity and completion of input inside a stacked form element.

Protocols/StackedFormViewDataSource.html.name: StackedFormViewDataSource
Protocols/StackedFormViewDataSource.html.abstract: Methods for asking the number of stack view elements and the stack view element at a particular index.

Protocols/StackedFormViewDelegate.html.name: StackedFormViewDelegate
Protocols/StackedFormViewDelegate.html.abstract: Methods for informing the expansion and collapse events, styling the call to action button for valid and invalid states and completion of the form. It also contains methods that asks the delegate for the layout information like collapsed stack element height and height of the call to action button.

Classes/StackedFormView.html#/delegate.name: delegate
Classes/StackedFormView.html#/delegate.abstract: The object that acts as the delegate of the stacked form view.

Classes/StackedFormView.html#/dataSource.name: dataSource
Classes/StackedFormView.html#/dataSource.abstract: The object that acts as the data source of the stacked form view.

Classes/StackedFormView.html#/stackedFor.name: stackedFormElement(at:)
Classes/StackedFormView.html#/stackedFor.abstract: Returns the stacked form element at the asked index.

Classes/StackedFormView.html#/setup().name: setup()
Classes/StackedFormView.html#/setup().abstract: Resets the current state of stacked form view and queries the data source to show the view. Stacked form view will not behave as expected unless this method is called.

Classes/StackedFormView.html.name: StackedFormView
Classes/StackedFormView.html.abstract: Create an instance of this view to avail the stacked form.

Global%20Variables.html.name: Global Variables
Global%20Variables.html.abstract: The following global variables are available globally.
